Is it possible to use the `getvdxfid` method without specifying a username and password?
No, it is not possible to use the `getvdxfid` method without specifying a username and password. The `--user` option is required to authenticate the request with the Verus JSON RPC server.

As json rpc
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getvdxfid", "params": ["idname::userdefinedgroup.subgroup.publishedname"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
